compatibility.notes: OSL-2.0 allows for weak copyleft, meaning that it can be combined with permissive licenses without imposing the same copyleft requirements on the combined work. However, combining with strong copyleft licenses like GPL may lead to incompatibility.

key_requirements: Include a copy of the Open Software License with any distribution.
Include copyright notice and any relevant notices in distributed copies.
State any changes made to the Original Work.
license.name: OSL-2.0
obligations: Distribute copies of Original Work or Derivative Works under the same Open Software License.
Provide a machine-readable copy of the Source Code along with the Original Work.
Do not use Licensor's name or trademarks without permission.
